statements: SELECT product_id, product_name, current_stock_level, reorder_point FROM InventoryLevels;
SELECT product_name, current_stock_level, reorder_point, product_id FROM InventoryLevels;
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM InventoryLevels ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM InventoryLevels WHERE current_stock_level < reorder_point;
SELECT product_id, product_name, current_stock_level FROM InventoryLevels WHERE current_stock_level > 50;
SELECT * FROM InventoryLevels WHERE current_stock_level < reorder_point
SELECT product_name, current_stock_level FROM InventoryLevels ORDER BY current_stock_level DESC
SELECT product_id, product_name, current_stock_level, reorder_point FROM InventoryLevels WHERE product_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200
SELECT product_name, current_stock_level FROM InventoryLevels WHERE current_stock_level > 50 ORDER BY product_name ASC
SELECT AVG(current_stock_level) AS average_stock_level FROM InventoryLevels
SELECT id, product_name, current_inventory, reorder_level, reorder_quantity FROM ReorderRequests;
SELECT product_name, current_inventory, reorder_level FROM ReorderRequests ORDER BY current_inventory DESC;
SELECT product_name, current_inventory, reorder_level FROM ReorderRequests WHERE reorder_quantity > 50;
SELECT id, product_name, current_inventory FROM InventoryLevels WHERE current_inventory < 10;
SELECT product_name, last_update FROM InventoryLevels ORDER BY last_update DESC;
SELECT * FROM ReorderRequests WHERE reorder_level < current_inventory ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, current_inventory FROM InventoryLevels WHERE current_inventory > 100 ORDER BY current_inventory DESC;
SELECT id, product_name, current_inventory FROM ReorderRequests WHERE product_name LIKE 'A%' AND current_inventory < reorder_level;
SELECT * FROM InventoryLevels WHERE current_inventory BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY last_update DESC;
SELECT id, product_name, reorder_quantity FROM ReorderRequests WHERE reorder_quantity > 20 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT product_name, stock_quantity FROM products;
SELECT supplier_name, location, contact_info FROM suppliers;
SELECT * FROM orders;
SELECT product_name, stock_quantity, reorder_threshold FROM products WHERE stock_quantity < reorder_threshold;
SELECT supplier_name, location FROM suppliers WHERE location='New York';
SELECT * FROM products WHERE stock_quantity > 50 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, stock_quantity FROM products WHERE reorder_threshold <= 10 ORDER BY stock_quantity DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, location, contact_info FROM suppliers WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY supplier_name;

SELECT orders.order_id, products.product_name, suppliers.supplier_name, orders.order_quantity, orders.order_date FROM orders JOIN products ON orders.product_id = products.product_id JOIN suppliers ON orders.supplier_id = suppliers.supplier_id WHERE orders.order_quantity >= 100 ORDER BY orders.order_date DESC;

SELECT products.product_name, suppliers.supplier_name, orders.order_quantity FROM products JOIN orders ON products.product_id = orders.product_id JOIN suppliers ON orders.supplier_id = suppliers.supplier_id WHERE products.stock_quantity < 20 ORDER BY orders.order_quantity ASC;
SELECT * FROM InventoryLevels;
SELECT ProductName, CurrentStock, MinStockLevel, MaxStockLevel FROM InventoryLevels;
SELECT ProductName, CurrentStock FROM InventoryLevels WHERE CurrentStock > 50;
SELECT SupplierName, ContactPerson, ContactNumber FROM Suppliers ORDER BY SupplierName;
SELECT ProductID, ProductName, Category, Price FROM Products WHERE Category = 'Electronics';
SELECT ProductName, CurrentStock, MinStockLevel, MaxStockLevel FROM InventoryLevels;
SELECT ProductName, Price, Category FROM Products WHERE Price > 50;
SELECT SupplierName, ContactPerson, ContactNumber FROM Suppliers ORDER BY SupplierName DESC;
SELECT ProductName, RequestedQuantity, Status FROM ReorderRequests WHERE Status = 'Pending' ORDER BY RequestedQuantity DESC;
SELECT ProductName, Category, Price FROM Products WHERE Category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY Price ASC;
SELECT * FROM Products;
SELECT product_name, current_inventory, reorder_level FROM Products ORDER BY current_inventory DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_address FROM Suppliers;
SELECT order_id, product_id, supplier_id, order_quantity FROM Orders WHERE order_quantity > 100;
SELECT user_id, role FROM Users ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Products ORDER BY product_name DESC, current_inventory ASC
SELECT product_name, current_inventory FROM Products WHERE current_inventory < 10
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_address FROM Suppliers WHERE LENGTH(supplier_address) > 20
SELECT * FROM Orders INNER JOIN Products ON Orders.product_id = Products.product_id INNER JOIN Suppliers ON Orders.supplier_id = Suppliers.supplier_id
SELECT Users.username, Users.role FROM Users WHERE role = 'admin'
